name: Crocodile Wild Life 3D
description:
Crocodile Wild Life 3D!!!!
Be a Wild Crocodile and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of crocodiles, fight against fierce animals like lion, elephant and rhino.
Features:
- Become the most powerful crocodile
- A lot of animals to fight: lioness, zebra, elephant, hippo and others!
- Fast and action packed gameplay
- Beautiful dynamic runtime world!
- Realistic savanna and water environments
- Amazing 3D graphics
